archimate:ApplicationComponent.name: Campaign Managment
archimate:ApplicationComponent.documentation:
Objective: Main Database with Contacts/Companies for List Generation and Engagements tracking and management
Key Features: - Adding/Creating Clients, Campaigns - Lists Creation and Management (segmentation, split,merge, applying SUP and NAC lists, etc.) - DB update (adding/updating/deleting contacts, updating companies info, titles mapping) - Collect engagements and email statuses in real-time - Submit lists for mailings, verification & email validation - Final email validation prior to submission to Clients
Additional Functionality: - Companies Tool - Contact Tool - Domains Tool - Titles tool - Functionality for special type of campaigns and engagements (ITBrief, Nurturing, DPO, SE, PL, SM, etc.) - Second touch automation - Refresh leads automation for Nurturing - Help panel - CS Results Upload Automation - Statistics charts for lists
